alert.note: Alert for Knox; Peoria; Stark (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 7:05PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN STARK...NORTHEASTERN KNOX AND NORTHWESTERN PEORIA COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CDT... At 705 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Victoria, or 12 miles east of Galesburg, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Princeville, Wyoming, Toulon, Brimfield, Wataga, Oneida, Williamsfield, Altona, Victoria, West Jersey, La Fayette, Gilson, Laura, Elmore, Duncan, Snake Den Hollow, Monica, and Dahinda. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 54 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
